Package org.pragmaticminds.crunch.examples.trigger

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExtractorsExamples
    Hold different examples for the usage of Extractors based on the TriggerEvaluationFunctionExample.
    ExtractorsExamples.AllChannelsExtractorExample
    This example shows an Extractor, that extracts all channels from the incoming record.
    ExtractorsExamples.MapExtractorsCollection
    This example shows an Extractor, that is extracting different channels and is keeping the naming.
    ExtractorsExamples.MappedExtractor
    This example shows an Extractor, that is extracting different channels and modifies the naming of the channels.
    SuppliersExamples
    This class demonstrates how Suppliers are to be used
    SuppliersExamples.AddMathematicsExample  
    SuppliersExamples.AndBooleanOperatorsExample  
    SuppliersExamples.BooleanChannelExtractorExample  
    SuppliersExamples.ContainsStringOperationsExample  
    SuppliersExamples.DateChannelExtractorExample  
    SuppliersExamples.DoubleChannelExtractorExample  
    SuppliersExamples.GreaterThatWithConstantComparatorExample  
    SuppliersExamples.GreaterThatWithTwoSuppliersComparatorExample  
    SuppliersExamples.LengthStringOperationsExample  
    SuppliersExamples.LongChannelExtractorExample  
    SuppliersExamples.MatchStringOperationsExample  
    SuppliersExamples.NotBooleanOperatorsExample  
    SuppliersExamples.ParseLongExample  
    SuppliersExamples.StringChannelExtractorExample  
    SuppliersExamples.ToDoubleCasterExample  
    SuppliersExamples.ToStringCasterExample  
    TriggerEvaluationFunctionExample
    This Class is a example for a simple evaluation crunch processing, where a sum over all channel values is created and written into the resulting GenericEvent.
    TriggerStrategiesExamples
    In this class are examples of TriggerStrategy usages.
    TriggerStrategiesExamples.TriggerStrategyAlwaysExample
    In this case the EvaluationFunction is always triggered, when a new record arrives.
    TriggerStrategiesExamples.TriggerStrategyNotNullExample
    In this case the EvaluationFunction is only triggered, when the set Channel has a value that is not null.
    TriggerStrategiesExamples.TriggerStrategyOnBecomeFalseExample
    In this case the EvaluationFunction is only triggered, when the set Channel has the boolean value true.
    TriggerStrategiesExamples.TriggerStrategyOnChangeGreaterThanExample
    In this case the EvaluationFunction is only triggered, when the set Channel has the boolean value true.
    TriggerStrategiesExamples.TriggerStrategyOnTrueExample
    In this case the EvaluationFunction is only triggered, when the set Channel has the boolean value true.
